revisionDesc.change: checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I have the honor to transmit herewith a copy of a letter just sent to the Dist. Attorney for the Western Dist. of Pennsylvania, relative to the case of Arthur Ballou,—which is the subject of your communication of this date.
